Name: PIPI IS YOU
About the game: PIPI IS YOU IS a platform-jumping Push Box puzzle game. Inspired by BABA IS YOU and I WANNA , the game borrows some words and grammar, but most of the words and meanings are different, or have a new feel in the platformer environment, as well as new words and mechanics. The game is designed to explore how this game-changing mechanic can be interesting in the context of platform jumping, while simultaneously using multiple jumps and firing bullets to push boxes to reach the target to win. The game takes some of the puzzle solving and difficulty out of the way and makes it more difficult to operate, but it's not particularly difficult. The operation of the game, WASD or the direction key to move, press SPACE or Z to jump or multiple jump, press X to fire bullets, press R to restart the level, press E to enter the door. Game features: 50 well-designed levels Different experience of pushing boxes Change rules on platform jumps Mechanic combinations full of surprises Relaxing guitar music Development Team: Zhou Shumu Responsible for most of the art for the game me, Cloud Responsible for game design, programming and a little art Email : 1053097933@qq.com
